alert.note: Alert for Coastal Rockingham; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Strafford (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 06 at 10:21AM EST until January 07 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches possible. * WHERE...Portions of central and southern New Hampshire and south central and southwest Maine. * WHEN...From late tonight through Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will overspread the region early Friday morning, with snow rates increasing through the morning hours and morning commute. Highest amounts are expected along the coast.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
